Title: In the beginning....
Additional show notes: Introduction of primary characters and the story of how SpaceStation23 comes to be!
Featured artists: Rare Earth, Dierks Bentley,J.J. Cale, Genesis

Title: The Mayor of Eddyburgh
Additional show notes: Tribute to Little Richard and introduction of the owner of the Space Station complex, Mayor Eddy
Featured artists: Jonathan Edwards, Playing for Change, Leon Russell, The Beatles, Little Richard

Title: What's New (to you)
Additional show notes: A healthy variety of music, including Mayor Eddy's request and the incomparable voice of Linda Ronstadt
Featured artists: Bruce Springsteen, Hank Williams Jr. w/ Waylon Jennings, Joe Jackson, Linda Ronstadt, Hothouse Flowers

Title: Victor Newman??
Additional show notes: Summer tunes, and an unexpected call from a Soap character!
Featured artists: Cream, Ridley Bent, Monte Python, Emmylou Harris, Sly and the Family Stone, Lovin' Spoonful

Title: Canadiana!
Additional show notes: Happy Canada Day! A celebration of a great diversity of Canadian artists.
Featured artists: Edmonton Symphony Orchestra, Tragically Hip, Joni Mitchell, Rush, Sarah Harmer, Rankin Family, Neil Young, Gordon Lightfoot

Title: Truly Classical
Additional show notes: A gentle introduction to Classical music, from popular movie themes to the legends!
Featured artists: John Williams, Ennio Morricone, Mozart, Debussy, John Horner, Rossini

Title: Hothouse Mix!
Additional show notes: Sweating it out in the Space Station, and jammin' under the stars!
Featured artists: Thomas Dolby, Beach Boys, Arcade Fire, Free, Doobie Brothers,

Title: Random picks
Additional show notes: A whale of a story from Bill Gaffigan and more great tunes plucked from the ether!
Featured artists: Bill Gaffigan, Prince, Buckingham-Nicks, Led Zeppelin, Procol Harum

Title: Harmony!
Additional show notes: Voices better in numbers...
Featured artists: Elton John, The Beatles, Doc Walker, Little River Band, Temptations, O'Jays, Voces8, Eagles

Title: Guests in SS23
Additional show notes: More music sharing, including an in station performance and a gathering of the Advisory Council
Featured artists: Bruce Cockburn, Heart, Commodors, Alison Kraus & Union Station, John Brine

Title: Symphonic Rock!
Additional show notes: Orchestras and rock, a match made in heaven!
Featured artists: ELO, The Beatles, Queen, Elton John, Judy Tzuke, Blue Jays

Title: Miss Alaneuss
Additional show notes: I my capacity as your Captain in the Space Station, I offer another episode of fine random tunes!
Featured artists: Tedeschi Trucks Band, Carly Simon, Van Morrison, Ricky Skaggs, Steve Earle Supertramp

Title: Autumn comin'
Additional show notes: Introducing the Omnisentient "Noodle" from Space Station 9, Crickets and leaves of Autumn, and Carl Sagan's Pale Blue Dot
Featured artists: Rodney Dangerfield, Annie Lennox, Leon Russell, Jesse Cook, Justin Hayward, Carl Sagan, Cassandra Vasic

Title: Another SS23 Mix
Additional show notes: In this episode... boats, monsters, sons, souls and a classic from The Band
Featured artists: The Pogues, Cat Stevens, David Bowie, Aimee Mann, Eric Carmen, Collective Soul, Playing for Change

Title: Countrified!
Additional show notes: A great mix of classic country and new artists, including some 2020 CCMA nominees.
Featured artists: Washboard Union, Big n Rich, Dierks Bentley and Friends, TRIO, Merle Haggard, Red Sovine, Eric Church, Tenille Townes

Title: E G B D F
Additional show notes: The Moody Blues classic 1971 album, Every Good Boy Deserves Favour in it's entirety!
Featured artists: Moody Blues

Title: John Lennon Tribute
Additional show notes: On the very day that John Lennon would have celebrated his 80th birthday, SS23 offers a dozen of his best songs.
Featured artists: John Lennon

Title: The Eddysburgh Address
Additional show notes: As is our custom, a good variety of new and classic tunes, PLUS, the Mayor of Eddyburgh speaks!
Featured artists: The Wallflowers, Billie Eilish, Fleetwood Mac, John Bonomassa, Anne Wilson

Title: Devil's Night!
Additional show notes: A spook story, Springsteens Ghosts and more...
Featured artists: Bruce Springsteen, Kathleen Edwards, Daniel Lanois, Van Morrison w/ Ray Charles, Led Zeppelin

Title: SS23 Stew
Additional show notes: A veritable Tune Soup, featuring some new inductees in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, and a gathering of the Advisory Council
Featured artists: Hothouse Flowers, Doobie Brothers, Marc Bolan and T - Rex, Arkels, Roxy Music

Title: Some JAZZ...
Additional show notes: Here's a soft intro to the world of Jazz music in it's myriad forms. Have a listen more than once...it can grow on ya...
Featured artists: Dizzy Gillespie, Chris Botti, Oscar Peterson, Cassandra Wilson, Irskin Hawkins, Joni Mitchell, The Richard Carpenter Trio

Title: Humor me...
Additional show notes: Some classic comedy bits, AND the Mayor shares some jokes...sort of.
Featured artists: Bill Murray, Foster Brooks, Jerry Seinfeld, Laura Elliot, Monte Python, Mayor Eddy, George Carlin, SCTV, Jeff Foxworthy

Title: Potpourie...
Additional show notes: In this, another episode of music sharing, we feature a couple of current Canadian artists and some classics including a 50 year gem from George Harrison
Featured artists: Dream Accademy, Playing for Change, Joe Walsh, J.J. Wilde, The Glorious Sons, George Harrison

Title: Christmas, part 1
Additional show notes: From the Boo Daley mix tape of yuletide favourites...enjoy!
Featured artists: The Beatles, Rita MacNeil, Emmylou Harris, Greg Lake, Sabrina Claudio, Ray Charles, Libera, John Denver, Faith Hill, John Mellencamp, The Carpenters, Kenny and Dolly, Chris Botti

Title: Christmas, part 2
Additional show notes: From the Boo Daley mix tape of yuletide favourites...enjoy!
Featured artists: The Stanley Bros, Tchaikovsky, Barbara Streisand, Shaggy, Alison Kraus and Alan Jackson, Pavoroti, Eagles, Eurythmics, The Canadian Brass, Bing and Bowie, Rascal Flatts, Bruce Springsteen, Nat King Cole, The Gatlin Bros.

Title: Covid and Country
Additional show notes: Episode 26 is a tribute to the many country artists we lost in 2020, 3 to the Corona virus, plus a sentmental favourite for the New Year
Featured artists: The Charlie Daniels Band, Hal Ketchum, John Prine, Joe Diffie, Charley Pride, Kenny Rogers, Dan Fogelberg
